```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(plotly)
```

## Grafica en 3D

```{r}
x <- y <- seq(0,10,by=.5)
z <- 50 + outer(10 * x ,  7*y ,"+")

fig <- plot_ly(x=x, y=y, z = z)
fig <- fig %>% add_surface()
fig

```
